title: New Comedy 'Schitt's Creek' From Canada Is A Reboot Of 'Green Acres'
teaser: The sitcom on Pop network is about a wealthy family that is thrust into poverty. Their interactions with the locals is the main story, and the main source of comedy â€” and it's worth checking out.
